content.detailedDescription: I woke to a bright light at 2am. super moon bright. i thought it was the moon or a light from a property behind my home but it wasn't the moon and there are no lights behind my house. just large trees. i could see it through the trees and then it was more clear. i got nervous. woke my husband and the light dimmed. my husband saw the dimmed light but assured me i was ok. i laid back down and the light was so bright i could see all of my trees (as bright as a baseball feild light) i jumped up and grabbed my son from his room and laid him next to me. closed the door and the light dimmed. i stared at it for a few minutes then it was gone and complete darkness outside. couldn't see a thing. my dog started to growl uncontrollably and my husband took her to walk the house until the dog was more comfortable. we all laid back down and fell asleep. wish i took video this went in for 20 minutes or longer.
content.summary: Woke up to super bright light out my window.

content.detailedDescription: Last night my wife and i saw 3 gliding red lights in a triangle formation. it lasted about 15 seconds.  i live in great falls mt. there is a big airforce base and a air national guard, we see a lot of crazy jets and big planes as we live close to the airport. the odd thing about these red lights is they were close enough that we should have heard them, but it was silent and for a long time before and after there were no planes to be heard or seen and there is a constant stream of planes everyday. it was odd and i would like to know if there is anyone who could help me figure out what it was. i have been a casual conspiracy theorist for my whole life so this is like a dream come true. thank you and happy hunting
content.summary: Three reddish round lights in a triangular shape. quiet

content.detailedDescription:
i was in my back yard when i noticed a very reflective object appear in the sky . it was about 6pm. the sky was clear and the moon was clearly visible.
i observed the object till it just vanished . over the next 20 minutes i witnessed 3 more of these. they seamed to look like stars .I asked my wife to come outside to verify what i was seeing.  because these objects would just appear seemingly out of nowhere my wife said that it could have been parachutes, but i have never seen parachutes from my backyard.  

i have attached a video i took from my phone
in the very beginning of the video you can see a floating white orb just above and to the right of the roof line to my garage you can then see the moon
content.summary: Between 6pm & 7pm saturday i witnessed multiple reflective objects that just seamed to apear out of the sky and travel in a south easterly direction sometime two at a time sometimes just one but this went on for about 45 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Was standing in backyard with friends and gazed almost straight upward at the moon and noticed a shimmering star that was moving in a very long wide arc from right upper side of the moon to left lowerside of the moon outline in the upper sky. as it continued in a very steady and smooth path of travel across the very distant sky it continued all the way across towards an easternly direction as it continued past the eastern horizon beyond line of sight. it did not appear to be on fire or look to be a meteorite or something entering earth's atmosphere. it never changed size or seem to be getting any larger as it approached or smaller as it went past and away from us. it did however on several occasions seem to get fainter and even mostly disappear and on a couple of other occasions grow brighter, but never actually changing in size or direction. i think that i would attribute this trait to possible cloud cover in the very upper regions of the sky obscuring the object from our sight from our vantage point. the object was viewed for what seemed to be a fairly long duration but at the same time it seemed to be moving at an extreme speed in the upper atmosphere. it might have been a satellite but a very swift and very low orbiting satellite or possibly some sort of space vehicle, missle or other upper atmosphere based craft entering into earth orbit. it did not appear to be falling out of orbit as it did not look like it was falling or being pulled down but more like it was going away and into a orbit. i can not find any launch or deployment info on the net that coinsides with this sighting. hence this is why i am inclined to report it here.
content.summary: Satellite, spacecraft, or some type of fast orbital or upper atmosphere craft across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
This object has been appearing over rhode island daily for a week now.
i first noticed it about 1 week ago,5 30 17, and have taken photos and video of said object using my android smartphones camera.
about 4am daily, something that must be rather large is reflecting the sun brillintly for about an hour before at seems to vanish as the angle of incidence changes. or perhaps it isn't visible in daylight but seems to remain in geostationary orbit as it's in the same spot every morning now. 
my wife and i both watched this every day for a week now and when you zoom in on the still pics you can clearly see a round metalic object. i doubt its a satelite, as its too large, but don't know the distance either. see pics, decide for yourself!    oddly enough, my face is peeling as if i got a sunburn between 4-5am eastern time              

btw, this is not my first report filed with mufon.  i've been a victim of sleep paralysis during which i witnessed a non human entity, have experienced lost time and seem to constantly be suffering from one ailment after another, and each battery of medical tests show nothing, yet i've scoop marks, etc..
content.summary: This object has been appearing over rhode island daily for a week now

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from susanville, california, heading north on california highway 89, when i saw the brightest sundog i had ever seen. the colors in the clouds were vivid and lacked the pastel colors i was used to seeing. the main cloud struck me as odd, so i grabbed my phone and just started taking as many photos as possible while driving. i did not notice the object until the next day while reviewing my photos. the pink, dome shaped craft appears clearly in several frames and appears to be moving toward the strange cloud i had been photographing. the object had a translucent pink aura and a very bright internal light eminating from it's center. upon closer inspection, i believe, it can be seen approaching the cloud from the northwest in the first few frames, and then it hovers and seems to move around the cloud somewhat, then heads out in a northeastern direction in the final frame.
content.summary: While driving i took multiple photos of sundog cloud. when i reviewed the photos the following day, there was a bright pink dome shaped object with light radiating from it's center, moving in several frames.

content.detailedDescription: My friend captured these photos in kelowna bc...Shes a respectable realtor and has no reason to make stuff up or photo shop pics. shes not looking for attention. these are legit photos taken. i wanted to share.
content.summary: Several round white blimps...Not clouds !!

content.detailedDescription: Around 6 20 pm (5 jun'17 - india - tamilnadu-chennai) i noticed a big cloudy halo ring for about 10 to 15 mins over the sky)i had doubt on that, any info please share with me.
content.summary: Around 6 20 pm i noticed a big cloudy halo ring for about 10 to 15 mins. i had doubt on that

content.detailedDescription:
It was shortly after sundown that my gf and i were sitting on my back patio, relaxing after dinner. as i have a habit of doing, i looked up at the sky (i enjoy sky watching) and noticed several objects to the north east that were moving. at first i thought there was a plane and the other objects were stars.

after watching for several minutes i noticed there was a larger bright object and 5 smaller objects and the smaller ones were moving rather erratically. i mentioned it to my gf who also confirmed that she saw it. while she was watching i went inside and brought out my binoculars to get a closer look. they were very high in the sky.

at this point, 2 of the 5 smaller craft had left the area, but 3 of the smaller ones were still there. the larger bright object had left also.

once we had the binoculars, we could see that the 3 smaller objects that were moving in what resembled figure 8 patterns but still very erratic, were circular. there was a pulsing red light in the center and a white light that ran around the outside in a clockwise motion.

this continued for at least 2 hours (from 8pm to 10pm), and we went to bed, while this was still going on.

these craft did not return the following or subsequent evenings.
content.summary: 3 to 5 lights high in the sky, moving with random patterns

content.detailedDescription: Apparition d'un crop circle dans la nuit du 1er au 2 juin 2017 dans un champ à crezancy en sancerre (cher, france),
content.summary: Crop circle

content.detailedDescription: When i was almost 12 years old, living in fulton missouri, i was hanging laundry out to dry just behind our home. for some reason i felt the desire to look up and saw a silver thing in the sky. it was plain as day, a long cigar shaped thing just sitting in one spot. it did not move, and although it was completely silver there were areas that were a slightly darker silver and i took those to be windows.  i thought i should call to my mother who was inside the house but then the thought came to me 'its just a satellite no need to call anyone'.  so i didn't.  i looked at it for a little while,continuing to hang the clothes out. but after the thought of it being a 'satellite' i seemed to lose interest in it and never looked up at it again.  it wasn't a plane, it wasn't moving. there was absolutely no noise coming from it.  it was not where the sun would affect my vision of it.  it just was.
content.summary: It was hovering straight above me

content.detailedDescription: I was talking with a friend by videocall, we were chatting, then he went outside and i was watching him , then the sun was on the top and i saw a little shadow, i asked him to direct the cam to the sun again and we saw the shadow and i took the pictures, awesome
content.summary: Ufo hidindg in the sunlight

content.detailedDescription:
1. viewd live feed weather cams, evidence by official web site stationary cams
 2. wierd sun behaviour patterns going on behind the chem trails
 3. chem trails expanding
 4. like i just passed an exam
 5. remote timelaps viewing
content.summary: Ufo's disc coming through portals, opening near the  sun. the ufo's are digital grey clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to smoke and i often stargaze. out of the corner of my eye was a flash of white light. i thought it was a meteor on entry. then i saw another flash, then the 3rd flash i caught in a starless field. i saw about 7 flashes total in 10 minutes. 
the flashes of light were obviously not objects but it was definitely happening in space. the lights were of significant size & brightness; i'd say bigger & brighter than jupiter in the night sky and they seemed to be the cause of an event instead of an object. for instance i thought it could've been a wormhole opening or closing but the lights more closely resembled a muzzle-flash, yes, as if i was witness to some star war.
in my last 15 seconds staring up i caught the movement of a tiny blue dot of light at 80% off horizon moving in a straight line from southwest to northeast until it vanished in the field where the flashing white lights had been. i'm considering that it could have been a craft leaving the planet from earth's southeastern hemisphere in a northeastern trajectory.

ps-i've been star-gazing my whole life, i have seen satellites, meteors, comets and the iss. these flashing white lights did not share any characteristics of the aforementioned space objects & if i had managed to track the blue dot of light to near the horizon i'd peg it as a satellite but it had just disappeared before my eyes at about 95% off the horizon. i don't know what that was.
content.summary: Random flashing of white light in space directly over head.

content.detailedDescription: I have previously reported strange lights in the area which witnesses have also seen and we have not been able to explain.Since then, about 3 weeks, i woke up the morning of may 27,2017 with rectangular markings on my left inner thigh that resemble burn marks.Prior to this, around 2 years ago when we moved to this location, i woke up to what resembles an incision on my right inner thigh. until the 27th i blew it off thinking it was a collapsed vien. now i'm not sure. i have a cousin that is abducted on a repeated basis. my whole family knows of these occurrences. there are witnesses to her abductions. i pray i'm not being abducted too, but these markings on my thighs are unexplainable. i have photos which i'd like to send you. hopefully you can give me some resolve? any help would be greatly appreciated. i have two young boys and fear for their safety. my 5yr old used to tell me and my wife someone was always in the room with him at night. he still refuses to go into a room unless there's a light on. please, just hear me out and let me send you the pictures of my thighs.
content.summary: I have "markings" on both inner thighs that i cannot explain.

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was at home and was watching the sky
2.Abnormal shining light
3.It wasn't a normal object like airplane or something like that
4.Floating .Abnormal shining light with strange movements
5.It wasn't strange to me i had seen before 
6.It faded slowly
content.summary: Floating and the began to move .Small lights spinning begged light

content.detailedDescription:
Came outside with the dog.  very big red light in sky in front of my house, perhaps 1 to 2 miles away over housing area.  stationary, zero movement, zero sound.  watched.  wondered if it was the same ufo from months ago. then it moved sideways and stopped.  very fast, but not ultra fast.  not a helicopter, no dips in its left sweep flight.  just a solid straight line path.  stopped.  lowered.  moved again.  did this many times.  seemed at one point to hide behind a palm tree, then come back out.  palm tree was across the street.  i think the object was about 1 1/2 miles away.  then descended out of site.  as it descended, it pulsed and showed small white lights.  very small white lights.

came out again 3 or 4 minutes later.  object was back in sky, slightly higher, solid hover, no deviation.  object came down a bit, stopped.  i was trying to photograph it, but it wasnt showing up on my camera well, so i skipped it.  as i put down the phone, object began rapid descent, would change descent a couple of times to about 3 degrees or more deviation, dimming of red lights, with small white lights flashing.

didnt see it again.  came in.
content.summary: Very bright light, very large light, hovering, then started rapid (not fast) movements horizontally, then descended out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: Looked like a airplane on fire falling from the sky. around the henderson area in las vegas, nv  happened around 20:00 hours on june 4  2017.
content.summary: Fireball. just fell out of the sky. was not a meteor.

content.detailedDescription: My friend took those 5 photos seconds apart. and the image to the left of the moon moved quickly
content.summary: A face

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were playing disk golf at hiestand park "hole 5" around 8:30pm on june 3rd 2017. i noticed a very bright light in the dusk sky to the south/south east about 30 degrees up and told her to look at it. she saw it right away and we both stood there and watched it. it was back dropped by the clouds as it was a warm and partly cloudy day, it looked like an airliner coming in for a landing with its landing headlights on or about 3-5 times the brightness of jupiter or the iss as it was such a bright ball of white light. it was in front of the clouds and appeared to not be moving much. we saw it for about 15 seconds and then it dimmed. i saw a small black dot as the light dimmed away, then the object completely vanished. within a couple minutes of me and my girl friend discussing the strange thing we just saw i pulled out my phone and googled flighttrader24 live flight radar to see if their were any flights at that position and direction and there didn't seem to be any...
content.summary: Very bright white light

content.detailedDescription: I have heard many times that san luis valley is a hot spot for ufo activity so i started putting out cameras to observe the sky above our cabin in san luis valley. when i started reviewing the footage i observed many meteors and satellites bu them saw something in the corner of my footage that lite the sky green multiple times. after the first orb appeared there was a second one that came into view that was a triangular shape. both "orbs" moved in multiple directions within seconds then left the screen. i want to send you my video so that maybe it could be analyzed to tell what the objects are. youtu.Be/ytf7xytg4zg. i uploaded it to youtube and that is the link.
content.summary: I  put my gopro to record sky at our cabin around 2am

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there!
i was at my home and i was watching a movie with my cousin and my room window is behind the computer monitor and a red light showed in a second in the sky and we go outside the window to see what was that and i took a video of it and the object was like a fire ball i dont know how to explain very well but it was really strange. 
thank you
content.summary: Strange

content.detailedDescription: At around 22:10, i witnessed a large, boeing style aircraft travelling slowly south east to north west and only noticed it as looked as though interior lights were on, however, when i grabbed my binoculars, i noticed that it was a white aircraft, obviously reflecting the sun low down on the horizon. it made a noise and traveled reasonably slowly. at 22:20, whilst having a cigarette with my neighbour, we see an extremely bright light travelling at some speed, when i say speed, i have seen the sr71 fly flat out over mildenhall on its last so called flight in the early 90's. well that wasn't a patch on what we see tonight. this thing really moved, straight line, no noise, no flashing lights, just a bright sphere. i looked at it through my binoculars, and it was brighter than jupiter, so could not make any markings or shapes out. i thought it could have been the iss, only i checked that out and it was over america at that time. it was also within our atmosphere. there were no afterburners either, though i know there are no modern fighters as fast as this thing was.
content.summary: Bright white spherical shape travelling at extreme speed.

content.detailedDescription: I wrote this report nearly a week ago, with a full description. but i have a feeling the computer let me down while sending it. the radar log for the area would have at least had a military transport, most likely an old hercules making sharp turns while having turned back from it's origanal course, and generally irratically circling in the area for 45 minutes plus, eventually moving further east in this pattern. it passed by originally to a slow moving object with dim lights in a triangular pattern. i can write a full report. but i have a feeling the computer will let me down again.
content.summary: Triangular slow moving craft, with a military turbo prop in attendance. observation, surveillance.

content.detailedDescription: I went to the hospital er having breathing problems last thing i remember was hearing sounds like pnenemonia then i slipped into a coma en i   i  had a feeling of being alone then i started coming to as a ambulance drove down a ramp to a underground parking structure where we boarded a elevator that seemed to take a long time, upon waking the 2nd time i was inside a hospital where aliens and us army personal were watching me i could see but not hear there conversation then after more blood  drawn i went back out and after 34 days of a coma i awoke in a rehabilitation hospital 40 miles from the hospital i had checked into an it was next to a va hospital a nurse took photos of the poor care i had been receiving a offered to get me a lawyer i could not talk because a machine was breathing for me after my first 8 hours awake i thought i had been hit by a car or in a plane crash on my 2nd day of being awake  when a dr came in and interduced his self as the bug dr and said i could go home when my white blood cells were within range it was then that i was told by bug dr that i had the most deadliest strain of mrsa upon my release i never went to any follow up appointments i was also informed that i had been given a experimental antibiotic and that it was so deadly the only safe way mufon or whatever you require of me i just want to get to the bottom of  this nightmare.    with my regards
content.summary: No ufo see be;ow for  synopsis

content.summary: Glowing lights appeared outside of the spirit airline window
content.locationName: LA ? ( flight was in rout, California

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping in the north ghost river campground last night and looked up as the first object was passing over, to describe the speed it was across the horizon in a matter of moments followed by two craft one of which converged on the second craft, if i were to estimate the orbital distance id have it pegged at 320 km above the earth and capable of traveling at speeds in excess of 224000 km/h (orbiting speed) 
a fourth object was also seen a few moments after traveling on a much more obscure path and making a wide arc to the south east to match the path of the first three objects. it's my belief based on the erratic behavior of these objects that these were piloted space craft under an extreme amount of power based on their ability to change direction suddenly. i was left feeling after the sightings terrified and afraid to sleep in my tent. 

my partner also was rattled by the amazing speed of the grouping of objects.
content.summary: Multiple craft traveling in orbit at speeds estimated to be 8/10x faster than any known satilite

content.detailedDescription: Before closing the sliding door to my back porch, i noticed a cluster of 5 orange lights in the sky. i watched and followed them through the sky for about minutes. when i noticed that there were more clusters behind them, i quickly ran inside to grab my phone to take some pictures and videos.  the lights moved across the sky and through a clearing in the trees.  when i realized that there was a continuous flow of lights that were moving across the sky, i quickly ran up to wake up my wife and she was amazed as well and took additional pictures and videos from the front of the house while i took them from the back of the house
content.summary: Clusters of orange lights traveling together in the same direction across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went to the house of the cousin on a bicycle,it was night.On the left side of the road was a fence and some trees first i saw a reflexion which distracted me after i have saw that reflexion few more times i decided to stop to see what is it.When i stopped a large flying object came over my head it was initially above the trees.It stopped moving and just floated above my head,it was making no noise.
it had very black color and a lot of lights on the edges but they weren't very bright.I felt amazed at what i had seen, but i was not afraid,after i heard a beautiful voice in my head saying"we're not here to hurt you".
i kept my head up looking at the object after i closed my eyes without wanting.After opening my eyes, i saw a very bright light that has frightened me and then i started to run.When i saw the bright light i was at same location,when i saw the light i was in the same place where i first stopped the bike.
content.summary: I went to the house of the cousin on a bicycle and at some point i saw a flying object hovering above a powerline

content.detailedDescription: This started as chemtrails/contrails being sprayed, then this orb showed up after the planes flew through, i cannot explain it, but this orb, or craft really, changes directions. and it even had light reflection off of it at times also beaming it out from itself.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This started as chemtrails/contrails being sprayed, then this orb showed up after the planes flew through.
